name: Extednded-ace-editor
body:
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/loose.dtd">
<html>
<head>
<title>ACE in Action</title>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery-1.9.1.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="https://github.com/erharindra/extednded-ace-editor/blob/master/ace_editor/src/ace.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="https://github.com/erharindra/extednded-ace-editor/blob/master/ace_editor/main_ace_editor.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">

$(document).ready(function(){
	AceEditor.init("editor", {theme:"twilight",isMultiFile:true} );
});

</script>
<style type="text/css">
</style>
</head>
<body>

	<textarea id="editor" style="width:500px;height:500px;"></textarea>

</body>
</html>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
